venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Despicable Me is showing in 3D at Blackstone Valley Cinema. Unlike Clash of the Titans and The Last Airbender, this movie was made for 3D. I read that the 3D effects are really good in this movie, unlike the other two. I like Steve Carell, and the movie is getting good reviews.

Let's go for the 6:50 PM show on Saturday for Despicable Me in 3D. We'll meet at about 6:20 in the lobby at Blackstone Valley. I changed this from the earlier show because one person said it was too early, and someone who RSVPed for the earlier show cancelled.

As usual, anyone who wants to can join me for dinner afterwards.

If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

- David

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Despicable Me in 3D
